amendment.description: Amendment sought to require public housing agencies to compensate each person who provides work pursuant to the requirements of the bill at a rate that is not less than the minimum wage rate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that public housing agencies shall ensure that each individual who provides work pursuant to the requirements in the bill receive compensation for such work at a rate not less than minimum wage.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt (NC) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 286 (Roll no. 103).
